resources.string:
Santractor is an enhanced version of the app Saavn Extractor by the same developer (Psychic).

The name Santractor is not a typo\, it is derived by combining Saavn + Extractor.

App is developed and maintained solely by Psychic (as of now).

App's source code is available on the GitHub. Select Source from navigation drawer to see app's source code.

App is based on the support libraries provided by Google and some third party libraries (Material Dialogs by afollestad, CircleImageView by hdodenhof).

You are free to download the source and build it yourself, credits should be given to original developer (Psychic).

You can see commits on GitHub for changelog.
"

- Make sure you have Installed Saavn App

- You need to have Saavn pro subscription

- You must login with your credentials in Saavn app.

- Download the song you want to save.

- Play that song after downloading is complete.

- Open this App.

- Choose Extract from Navigation Drawer.

- Enter the song's name.

- Click Save\!

- Changed background color to white. 

- Show changelog with option to disable it. 

- Show changelog whenever app is upgraded. 

- Show current selection in app's settings. 

- Added option to reset settings. 

- Fixed typos in about app section. 

- Option to select startup screen. 

- Sync NavList selection with selected pref. 

- Move welcome message to activity. 

- Automatically fetch song name from notification. 

- Fix error where song name always returned null if program was unable to fetch the song name. 

- Reset text field after saving the song. 

- Fixed issues where songs with same filenames were over-written. 

- "Show Custom Tabs" is now always false if chrome is not installed. 

- "black.dragon74" is now "Psychic." 

- Implement responsive changelog. 

- Don't kill app, to improve performance.
